appetizers.title: Creamy Avocado Dip
appetizers.description: A slightly creamier version of guacamole, this no-cook avocado dip can be enjoyed with fresh veggies, tortilla chips, or a combination of both.

appetizers.title: Cheese Puffs
appetizers.description: They are light and airy, and they melt in your mouth
